challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the summer it will be warm.

challenges.meaning: In the summer it will be warm.

challenges.formattedSolution: W lece bãdze ciepło.
In the summer it will be warm.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Na jeseni bãdzemë widzec padające lëste.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the autumn we will see falling leaves.

challenges.answer: Na jeseni bãdzemë widzec padające lëste.
challenges.meaning: In the autumn we will see falling leaves.

challenges.formattedSolution: Na jeseni bãdzemë widzec padające lëste.
In the autumn we will see falling leaves.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: W zëmie bãdzëce grac ze sniege.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the winter you will play with snow.

challenges.answer: W zëmie bãdzëce grac ze sniege.
challenges.meaning: In the winter you will play with snow.

challenges.formattedSolution: W zëmie bãdzëce grac ze sniege.
In the winter you will play with snow.
Zymk przëniese kwiatë.
Spring will bring flowers.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Pòrô rokù sã bãdze zmiéniac sztërë razë.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: The season will change four times.

challenges.answer: Pòrô rokù sã bãdze zmiéniac sztërë razë.
challenges.meaning: The season will change four times.

challenges.formattedSolution: Pòrô rokù sã bãdze zmiéniac sztërë razë.
The season will change four times.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the winter it will snow.

challenges.meaning: In the winter it will snow.

challenges.formattedSolution: W zëmie bãdze padac sniég.
In the winter it will snow.
Na zymk ròsną kwiatë.
In spring, flowers grow.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the summer, there is a lot of sun.

challenges.meaning: In the summer, there is a lot of sun.

challenges.formattedSolution: W lece je wiele słunka.
In the summer, there is a lot of sun.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Na jeseni bãdzësz wiele czerpiec przez deszcz.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the autumn, you will suffer a lot because of the rain.

challenges.answer: Na jeseni bãdzësz wiele czerpiec przez deszcz.
challenges.meaning: In the autumn, you will suffer a lot because of the rain.

challenges.formattedSolution: Na jeseni bãdzësz wiele czerpiec przez deszcz.
In the autumn, you will suffer a lot because of the rain.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: The air in winter will be cold.

challenges.meaning: The air in winter will be cold.

challenges.formattedSolution: Pòwiôtr w zëmie bãdze zëmni.
The air in winter will be cold.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Lato je pòrą òdpòczënkù przë jezórze.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Summer is the season of rest by the lake.

challenges.answer: Lato je pòrą òdpòczënkù przë jezórze.
challenges.meaning: Summer is the season of rest by the lake.

challenges.formattedSolution: Lato je pòrą òdpòczënkù przë jezórze.
Summer is the season of rest by the lake.
Jeséń mô wiele kòlorów.
Autumn has many colors.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Zëma nie je dobrô dlô sportowców.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Winter is not good for sports.

challenges.answer: Zëma nie je dobrô dlô sportowców.
challenges.meaning: Winter is not good for sports.

challenges.formattedSolution: Zëma nie je dobrô dlô sportowców.
Winter is not good for sports.
Zymk je nudni.
Spring is boring.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Pòrë rokù sã zmiéniają sztërë razë w rokù.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: The seasons change four times a year.

challenges.answer: Pòrë rokù sã zmiéniają sztërë razë w rokù.
challenges.meaning: The seasons change four times a year.

challenges.formattedSolution: Pòrë rokù sã zmiéniają sztërë razë w rokù.
The seasons change four times a year.
Chùtkò kùńczi sã lato.
Summer will soon end.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In autumn, it will rain a lot.

challenges.meaning: In autumn, it will rain a lot.

challenges.formattedSolution: Na jeseni blós pôdô deszcz.
In autumn, it will rain a lot.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Winter has a lot of snow.

challenges.meaning: Winter has a lot of snow.

challenges.formattedSolution: Zëma mô wiele sniegù.
Winter has a lot of snow.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: They will see a green landscape.

challenges.meaning: They will see a green landscape.

challenges.formattedSolution: Òni bãdą widzec zieleną krajãòbraz.
They will see a green landscape.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Słuncé bãdze swiecëc sëlno w lece.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: The sun will shine strongly in the summer.

challenges.answer: Słuncé bãdze swiecëc sëlno w lece.
challenges.meaning: The sun will shine strongly in the summer.

challenges.formattedSolution: Słuncé bãdze swiecëc sëlno w lece.
The sun will shine strongly in the summer.
